content:
I write about two things:
Engineering work: systems, performance, architecture, the craft. Adventures: mountaineering, trip reports, and what the mountains teach. This site is a long-form notebook: reflective, practical, and occasionally cinematic.
If you’re new here:
Start with Engineering for systems work, performance notes, and architecture decisions. Start with Adventures for trip reports, route notes, and mountain lessons. Contact If you’d like to reach me, email is best. (Fill these in.)
Email: you@domain.com GitHub: https://github.com/yourhandle LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yourhandle/ RSS: /index.xml
summary:
I write about two things:

  • Engineering work: systems, performance, architecture, the craft.
  • Adventures: mountaineering, trip reports, and what the mountains teach.

  • Start with Adventures for trip reports, route notes, and mountain lessons.
